name: Auto Theft City - Guns Mission
description:
You live in one of the most dangerous cities of the world, where the sin is all around the city. You’ve had a tough life. You didn’t want to, but you became one of them. And now, look at your, running away, hiding yourself, stealing and, if it’s needed, even killing. You are there, in the middle of brutal gang wars, trying to survive. But specially you are wanted by corrupted cops.

Succeed in your gangster missions to become the city boss!

In this amazing open world realistic game, you just have one major goal: runaway from cops. Policemen are all around you. And you have to run, run fast… But how? That’s the best part of this game. However you can… You should do whatever is needed to move yourself around the city and discover every corner. Just go there and explore the city. And for that you will have to pick (aka steal) cars and motorbikes from the streets, drive carefully until you get to your own garage.

Your garage is your safe spot. It’s here where you only will be safe. In your garage is where you can personalize your cars and motorbikes, and also where you can change your own outfits. But take care because you don’t have unlimited parking slots: you need to buy more space to keep you, let’s put this way, “acquisitions”.

But this third person game is not only about being out there in the full open world. This is also about getting missions completed and evolve within the game to be the best player ever. From this game, you will love everything: it has amazing graphics and control and it is filled with adventure and action. What else can you expect?

Enjoy this full action packed game! Challenge the limit of the city and survive!
